scripts.dev: node scripts/generate-sitemap.mjs && ROBOTS_MODE=public node scripts/generate-robots.mjs && nuxi dev
scripts.build: node scripts/generate-sitemap.mjs && node scripts/generate-robots.mjs &&  nuxi build
scripts.generate: NUXT_SSG=true node scripts/generate-sitemap.mjs && node scripts/generate-robots.mjs && NUXT_SSG=true nuxi generate && node scripts/post-generate.mjs
